text.emotional: If you say that, I may have to reevaluate my definition of romance. As this makes two people having told me this by now. My ex-girlfriend being the other person.
text.silence: {.} if you say that {....} i may have to reevaluate my definition of romance {....} as this makes two people having told me this by now {....} my ex girlfriend being the other person {...}
